original_text: The time came for him to die. So he called his son Joseph to come to him. Jacob said to him, ‘If you agree, make a serious promise to me. Put your hand between my legs to show that I can trust you. Promise that you will be kind to me and that you will do as I ask. When I die, do not bury me here in Egypt.
korean_text: 이스라엘이 죽을 날이 가까우매 그의 아들 요셉을 불러 그에게 이르되 이제 내가 네게 은혜를 입었거든 청하노니 네 손을 내 허벅지 아래에 넣고 인애와 성실함으로 내게 행하여 애굽에 나를 장사하지 아니하도록 하라

sentences.original_text: The time came for him to die.
So he called his son Joseph
make a serious promise to me.
Put your hand between my legs
sentences.korean_translation: 네 손을 내 허벅지 사이에 넣어

sentences.original_text: to show that I can trust you.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 신뢰할 수 있다는 것을 보여주세요.

sentences.original_text: Promise that you will be kind to me
and that you will do as I ask.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 요청하는 대로 할 것을 약속하세요.

sentences.original_text: do not bury me here in Egypt.
